text: Stan Smith (17 April 1925 – 8 June 2019) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). His brother Ron also played for Collingwood. == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Stan Smith (Australian footballer, born 1925)
